Considering the old Attrox was broken and a far better design than what he's become now these nerfs to the new kit is like battering an old man who's been kicked out onto the streets. How can you expect anyone to agree with what you've done?

Getting an S and an S+ on the old Attrox was much easier and much more enjoyable than trying to get good with his new mechanics. It's not satisfying or rewarding. I remember in the last Attrox game I ever played before his stupid changes I went 8/0 and got an S+ in a ranked game and made them surrender at 16 minutes. I will always hate this new Attrox and I guarantee you if there was a poll the community would overwhelmingly agree.

Revert Jungle changes, revert ADC changes, revert Mage changes, BUFF Aatrox instead of nerfing the poor sucker (he has the LOWEST BASE STATS IN THE GAME! hes meant to be a fighter! his new kit revolves around slow, sluggish, all-in combat that is TELEGRAPHED. he has NO FUTURE IN MID-LATE GAME UNLESS HE CAN ALL IN 1v9), dont NERF TELEPORT when taking teleport is a result of the IMPOSSIBILITY to play the roles that are taking teleport in order to survive, revert sion changes (sion main). Jungle role was forced into funelling because the jungle changes literally removed interaction with camps AND SCUTTLE BECAUSE ITS CONTESTED MORE THAN BUFFS ARE NOW LITERALLY BECAUSE YOU NEED IT TO PLAY THE GAME.

i was at first optimistic about all the 8.10-13 patches, because they were new and fresh changes, but its literally destroyed in-game roles, player strategies, and ingame interaction. I've literally queued against strangers and have them all rather run it down mid, they didnt even know eachother, but they'd rather troll to have fun then play the current meta. 2 teams of random solo players. its actually sad. and millions of people are ADDICTED TO THIS GAME.

jungle changes only serves to break the super early jungle interference. a jungler who clears fast and comes to gank you with all 3 abilities while you just hit 2 is not a great feeling if you are playing anything that scales. the crab change isn't even that important til mid/late game when you want extra vision on objective and the good amount of gold (scales later, little gold early). jungler were not FORCED into funneling, people just realized how efficient this strategy was on anyone with some good ratios. getting 1 carry fed is alot faster and effective then trying for 3 or even 4 carrys, good example been rng vs kzdx, where uzi's team build several peel item despite reduced efficiency for each subsequent use. 
ADC changes oh boy controversial topic.the game has been a gold funneling farming game for 30 minutes because people got so good at figuring out the game they realize they DON'T have to do anything risky other then sit back and have your lv3 jungler perma camp bot and setup vision and have a hyperpeeler support and shield/heal AND RIGHT CLICK EVERYONE TO DEATH WHILE YOUR SUPPORT GIVES YOU A 2000 HP SHIELD.  
HOWEVER riot did go overboard with the crit changes and now they are targeting every adc individually for a buff. in contrast, Bruisers has sucked to play because STAT CHECK tanks toplane been better at everything they do and riot finally brings out a fervor replacement and boom insta nerf. compared to the 10-60ad on pbe it is now 6-35ad, compare to fervor's 8-64. still, im just happy bruisers are even viable again.
teleport nerfs is also imo overboard. teleport buffs in season 5 is what brought the tank into meta since they can keep up lane pressure if they make a mistake in laning phase. (safer game play, sounds like ADC surely). BUT with the ignite buffs i don't see TP nerf as balancing since tanks are mediocre right now (cc' champion coming back to meta tho). feels like Riots push to make this game more broadcast-able on tv (kills and teamfights early) to gain popularity because some thinks league is "dying". its not, it just hit it's middle-age, where players who want to be playing already is or they have quite due to the last 3 season ("FUN").
mage changes? imo mage changes made them stronger, tankier and more reliable overall(more mana cooldown). perhaps they didn't want mid to be a perma "shove n' roam". (lane interaction for greater broadcast-bility)
aatrox...now thats the ONLY sad thing i see here. so many season in exile, finally back to meta for a good 2-3 patch (due to his decent/safe enough laning with heal and insane 2 item powerspike) make him a god of 1v1,1v2 and sometimes 1v3. boom, changed. you still have to take his winrate with a grain of salt since NO champion gets release with a positive winrate. would be a certain indication for broken-ness if there were. aatrox is oppressive early with his damage. it doesn't matter if he can land it, you are not suppose to. you are suppose to make you opponent know they CANNOT 1v1 trade with you due to the insane qqq damage. but im gonna say that old aatrox definitely was far superior in every EVERY aspect, lore and gameplay. now his a fool who says "champion name+ bad joke+ come+ i kill u"
yes league if becoming simplified for the sake of wider audience. but it's what it needs. remember 88% of the player base is not lcs pros,(or in some cases a edgy adc main who cries on r/leagueoflegends everyday) they are you everyday average joes. i have not had such fun with the game since season 5 and im kind of glad.

what i will say about some of the issues you brought up:
undo TP nerf; crippling a playstyle even when unnecessary.

bring back aatrox; he has hit a balance breakthrough, minor nerf(to old aatrox) can see him viable and not broken nor garbage.

crit changes: right direction but overdone and awfully executed. make crit items 150 gold cheaper and 5% less crit so:
adc WON'T be able to do the cancerous SHIV and EDGE build where they can either half health you with 1 auto or clear a wave with 1 auto.(and roam so early for a adc)
infinity edge will be able to double 25% crit to 50% and 50 to 100. this way adc won't spend gold on the 20% bonus crit chance they WONT utilize(conventionally anyways).(if they choose 30%+30% crit and double with a infinity edge.

I'd rather play Warcraft 3 than play LoL in its current state. banner removal was sad enough, but if that meta was something people enjoyed and disliked, then bring it back as a seperate game mode that people can devote themselves to. thats right, I'm talking about BMB. bring back Black Market Brawlers. make a 1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1 gamemode where you can farm creeps for items and have them automatically upgrade into component items instead of opening a shop, this is the coliseum mode that people keep memeing about when they mention battle royale. you dont need 100 players in one server to play a battle royale.
